abstract: An array of download objects representing the downloadable content associated with the transaction.
overview:
## Discussion

The contents of this property are undefined except when [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/SKPaymentTransaction/transactionState] is set to [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/SKPaymentTransactionState/purchased]. The [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/SKDownload] objects stored in this property must be used to download the transaction’s content before the transaction is finished. After the transaction is finished, the download objects are no longer queueable.

# downloads

**Instance Property**

An array of download objects representing the downloadable content associated with the transaction.

## Declaration

```swift
var downloads: [SKDownload] { get }
```

## Discussion

The contents of this property are undefined except when [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/SKPaymentTransaction/transactionState] is set to [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/SKPaymentTransactionState/purchased]. The [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/SKDownload] objects stored in this property must be used to download the transaction’s content before the transaction is finished. After the transaction is finished, the download objects are no longer queueable.
title: downloads
